body: Unfortunately that just uploaded an image of the icon, and not the log file itself, but I can make an educated guess: OpenRA itself still supports 10.6.8 (but no earlier), but many other software packages don't including newer versions of mono. Brew cask installs mono 4.0.4 as a dependency, which I expect will be crashing during startup.  Try installing version 3.4 or 3.2.8 from http://download.mono-project.com/archive/ instead.

This is the text from the log file, let me know if it sheds any more light.
I'll try the mono stuff.
Will it automatically replace the previous mono, or will I need to somehow tell the system and/or openRA which version to use?

Cheers
Dan

Operating System: OSX (Unix 10.8.0.0)
Runtime Version: Mono 4.0.4 ((detached/d481017) CLR 4.0.30319.17020
Exception of type `System.TypeInitializationException`: An exception was thrown by the type initializer for OpenRA.Support.PerfHistory
Inner Exception of type `System.TypeInitializationException`: An exception was thrown by the type initializer for System.Drawing.KnownColors
  Inner Exception of type `System.TypeInitializationException`: An exception was thrown by the type initializer for System.Drawing.GDIPlus
    Inner Exception of type `System.DllNotFoundException`: /Library/Frameworks/Mono.framework/Versions/4.0.4/lib/libgdiplus.dylib
      TypeName=``
        at (wrapper managed-to-native) System.Drawing.GDIPlus:GdiplusStartup (ulong&,System.Drawing.GdiplusStartupInput&,System.Drawing.GdiplusStartupOutput&)
  at System.Drawing.GDIPlus..cctor () [0x000cc] in /private/tmp/source-mono-mac-4.0.0-bug-33585-hotfix/bockbuild-mono-4.0.0-branch/profiles/mono-mac-xamarin/build-root/mono-4.0.4/mcs/class/System.Drawing/System.Drawing/gdipFunctions.cs:119 
      at System.Drawing.KnownColors..cctor () [0x0001a] in /private/tmp/source-mono-mac-4.0.0-bug-33585-hotfix/bockbuild-mono-4.0.0-branch/profiles/mono-mac-xamarin/build-root/mono-4.0.4/mcs/class/System.Drawing/System.Drawing/KnownColors.cs:215 
    at System.Drawing.Color.get_Red () [0x00000] in /private/tmp/source-mono-mac-4.0.0-bug-33585-hotfix/bockbuild-mono-4.0.0-branch/profiles/mono-mac-xamarin/build-root/mono-4.0.4/mcs/class/System.Drawing/System.Drawing/Color.cs:879 
  at OpenRA.Support.PerfHistory..cctor () [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at OpenRA.Game.Initialize (OpenRA.Arguments args) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at OpenRA.Program.Run (System.String[] args) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at OpenRA.Program.Main (System.String[] args) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0

The log tells us that the version of mono that you've installed does not include all of the mono components.  Several third party mono distributions don't include `libgdiplus.dylib` because it is difficult to compile and package.  The best I can suggest is again to use an official mono package from http://download.mono-project.com/archive/
